overview: Carbosyn is a speculative film that envisions a post-work world placed inside of an air-scarcity future. As the temperature reaches the level of 2,3 degrees the planet struggles to breath, forcing the humanity to radically restructure the world. A transition to a post-carbon mode of production comes along with deploying automated systems while dismantling the old power structures. The Great Terraforming project of planetary decarbonization unfolds as the only way to keep the Earth a liveable place.
title: Carbosyn
